General.Name: CMO Public Company Limited
General.Description: CMO Public Company Limited engages in the business of event management for public events, exhibitions, and entertainment activities in Thailand. The company provides digital and hybrid event; event and experiential marketing solution; exposition and exhibition management; museum exhibition planning and construction design; private lifestyle service and event; and organized meetings incentive convention and exhibition, and professional conference. It also provides music and entertainment, audio visual and multimedia solution, and creative experiences to nurture childhood development for children; venue rental; and digital solutions. Further, it offers event equipment rental service comprising the rental of image, lighting, sound, and effects; production of multi-visual slides, videos, multimedia and computer graphics; event management for private event, wedding ceremonies, birthday parties and other. In addition, the company organizes concerts, festivals, plays, facilitating artists; designing, and arranging control stage; and creative planning for advertising, and marketing activities. CMO Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
